Installation and execution:
1. Install required packages:
```bash
pip install shiny
```

2. Save code to a file (e.g. `app.py`)

3. Run from command line:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

Package dependencies:
- shiny

The app demonstrates how to use `ui.update_text()` to dynamically update a text input's label based on user interaction. When the user selects a different pet type, the text input's label updates to include the selected pet type.
## Preview the app on [Shinylive](https://shinylive.io/py/app/#h=0&-WGkFiChV4Hu3ZVmuZ+AoX2JMz+nqokMdMDBojgVG0MBiACODjE8EorFb8UIJHIVBoKDAChgXn8pAod2yCh+AmJiRSzMK5Nzjtaq7nEAA)
